1.0.name: wordpress/drafts-dropdown
1.0.description: Wish you had quicker access to your draft posts and pages? Tired of having to click Edit / Drafts to get there? Problem solved - the Drafts Dropdown plugin gives you links to all of your drafts on every screen through a handy tab.
